author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Combined Motor Holdings Says Chairman ‍John Edwards To Retire
text:
April 3 (Reuters) - Combined Motor Holdings Ltd:
* ‍JOHN EDWARDS HAS ADVISED THAT HE WILL BE RETIRING AS DIRECTOR AND CHAIRMAN OF CMH WITH EFFECT FROM 31 MAY 2018​
* EDWARDS WILL BE SUCCEEDED BY JAMES DIXON, A CURRENT INDEPENDENT NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
